# Recipe Images

## How to Add Your Images

### 1. Copy Your Images Here
Place your image files in this folder:
- `recipe1.jpg` - Shrimp Mushroom Tofu Soup
- `recipe2.jpg` - Pumpkin Pancakes
- `recipe3.jpg` - Potato Egg Pancake
- `recipe4.jpg` - Comfort Food
- `note1.jpg` - Braised Pork Belly
- `note2.jpg` - Peanut Red Bean Smoothie
- `note3.jpg` - Juicy Dumplings
- `note4.jpg` - Braised Spare Ribs
- `banner1.jpg` - Carousel banner 1
- `banner2.jpg` - Carousel banner 2
- `banner3.jpg` - Carousel banner 3

### 2. Supported Formats
- JPG/JPEG
- PNG
- WebP
- GIF

### 3. Recommended Sizes
- **Recipe covers**: 800x600px or 4:3 ratio
- **Note images**: 800x600px or 4:3 ratio
- **Banners**: 1200x400px or 3:1 ratio

### 4. File Naming
Keep the names as shown above, or update the paths in:
- `database/sample_data.sql`
- Vue component files (Recipes.vue, Notes.vue, etc.)

## Quick Start with Placeholder Images

If you don't have images yet, you can use free placeholder services:
- https://picsum.photos/800/600 (random photos)
- https://via.placeholder.com/800x600 (solid colors)
- https://source.unsplash.com/800x600/?food (food photos)
